ComicInfo.Title: Unfinished Business
ComicInfo.Summary:
Though outnumbered, Nira-X and Officer Elrok stand their ground against the five alien criminals. When Oasis shock troopers arrive, Nira-X thinks they are on her side. She is surprised to discover they're not. The shock troopers defeat and deport the aliens. Kathryn shows up and fakes her and Nira-X's death. Secretly, they intend to lay low for a while while drifting on a yacht in the Carribean.
Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-04-04 19:42:32. [CVDB254816]
